title: 101: The Stay-at-Home Food Trends Episode
itunes:title: The Stay-at-Home Food Trends Episode
description: In this episode, Lisa, Jamie, and Mikey are highlighting trends and tips for coffee, baking, pantry foods, and MORE!!! Plus, great ideas for the biggest thing in the HG world right now… mug recipes! But that’s not all -- Lisa gets a surprise cocktail from her niece Lauren! Don’t miss the most fun episode of the year, and when you’re done, head on over to our Foodcast page for more tips and food finds mentioned in the episode!
itunes:summary: New food trends are popping up at home and we’ve got the 411 of FOUR of ‘em! #quarantinecuisine
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
